name: deimosrising
text: One of the all time greats. I eagerly await a day when saying this reaches a nadir of inappropriateness and I can deploy the phrase.

name: jaminspoon
text:
We wait together then, friend. As one.
In the most hetero of ways, though. No offense.

name: atticusonline
text: Onstad had a great story arc here.

name: hollis
text: "SO nude!"

name: scion
text: The epitomy of nudity?

name: lexsenthur
text: The nudest.

name: pascal
text: Goal for the week, use this phrase.

name: thedice
text: Such a noble goal.

name: andrew_
text:
The best part of this strip is the 3rd picture of Phillipe.

He looks so confident, and even a little sassy.

name: johnnylandmine
text: Is it just me, or is he posing as a lawn jockey?

name: c_dizzle
text: A comment left by c_dizzle was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Aki, jashin, vykromond)

name: zefiel
text: I always thought those could be Philippe's siblings. I guess when you're a single kid you don't want others to be.

name: professoryes
text: That is an intriguing idea. I don't know that it's a purposely malicious thing, but maybe it changes the perception of what siblings are to others.

name: salo
text: And what they are to otters.

name: skavid
text: Is SO confident.

name: fuckyoufriday
text: Vlad will take you to planes of nudity you could never dream of.

name: caseyb3
text: Considering the fact he's a robot, this is a creepier promise than it seems.

name: a_dude
text: perfect eastern European phone pickup line...

name: varnish
text: puf

name: spinynorman
text: Once upon a time large pufs of smoke indeed came from the mouth of the man we call Waits

name: varnish
text: Who is this Waits fella you keep mentioning? Friend of yours?

name: landowmpg
text: ...said Tommy the Cat as he reeled back to clear whatever foreign matter may have nestled it's way into his mighty throat.  Many a fat alley rat had met its demise while staring point blank down the cavernous barrel of this awesome prowling machine.  Truly a wonder of nature this urban predator; Tommy the Cat had many a story to tell, but it was a rare occasion, such as this, that he did.

name: deancain29
text: Philippe in a cep. so nude.

name: nurdbot
text: A great relationship in the making there!

name: clembot
text: the zoom in is key

name: mega_panda
text: I should use this. Why? Because my name really is Vlad: and of our kind, he is a pioneer

name: untilyouaresonude
text: I love this strip for obvious reasons.

name: evolume
text: you love it because you are so named?

name: gunsofray
text: I love you.

name: spectre
text: A comment left by spectre was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by orvel, Ikrizzle, peterjoel)

name: lawdog
text: Note that Philippe's mother does not make an appearance in the final panels.  For obvious reasons.

name: c_dizzle
text: She is busy having a shock-induced aneurysm that will result in her brows permanently furrowed?

name: tom-ba
text: No, Vlad is leaning close to us , so we can feel really comfortable.

name: rogergs
text: Philippe's mother is much like Ray's mother.  Excepting the speciation.

name: nicolae
text: Truly, he is King of the Make-Outs.

name: dans
text: Incidentally, Phillipe is a cyborg by birth. Vlad might get lucky if he doesn't mind getting over there.

name: chrissketch
text: "Flod"?

name: drskradley
text:
A mispronunciation of "Vlad." Assetbar's lack of being able to use the phonetic alphabet doesn't help me to explain.

Think: "vflaahD," with "vf" being in between a "v" and an "f" as it is assumed a Russian would pronounce it, the "aah" being fairly self-explanatory, and the "D" being an especially voiced "d". That's how I take it, anyway, with my limited knowledge of Slavic language phonetics.

name: drskradley
text: To further explain, which I left out, I'm guessing that's how Vlad himself pronounces his name - which, after going through a few people, ended up at Philippe's mother as "Flod."

name: zeal
text: There's a reason he's DOCTORskradley.

name: skoora
text: These lines don't actually work, by the way.

name: boredom_man
text: They do on me. Does that help you any?

name: lux
text: If a man had sack enough to say this to me, he'd at least get second base.

name: tekende
text:
Interesting.

On a completely unrelated note, can we get together sometime?

name: jaldor
text: You know, girls always say stuff like that, but really, if some eastern european dude came up to you in a bar and began spouting off about the levels of nudity he was going to make you, I highly doubt the first thing you'd do is offer him a squeeze.

name: coco
text: I'll know my chances of achieving a make out become solidified the moment I finish asking: "We are connectink, no? You haf such sexy voice." Guaranteed. Bone bone bone.

name: kelsotimebomb
text:
... bone bone bone.

Six times?

name: elscoob
text: Enough, Already!

name: atypicaloracle
text: Having actually been hit on by a man eerily similar to Vlad, this comic gives me the damn vapors. And not in a good way. In a "I feel *so* nude and it is terrible" sort of way.
